body:
Hey,
haven't done anything like this before, even though there have been a lot of AMA's lately :P
So, fire the questions towards me!
body_tagged:

haven't done anything like this before, even though there have been a lot of AMA's lately :P

title: [AMA] Clijmart

replies.body:
What is your favorite type of clouds?
Laptop or computer?
How many pages should be in book?
replies.body_tagged:
What is your favorite type of clouds?
Laptop or computer?
How many pages should be in book?

replies.body:
1. None, hate clouds, ew
2. Have played on laptop for years, but recently got a computer which is way better in my opinion.
3. Blegh, books, I'd say the less the better...
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Opinions, fav staff member, how are u? Favourite color, movie, book, car?
replies.body_tagged: Opinions, fav staff member, how are u? Favourite color, movie, book, car?

replies.body:
I guess I can answer your first 2 questions at once, since you're my favorite staffmember :P
Secondly, I'm fine, thank you <3
Fav color: Light green
Movie: The Hunger Games 
Book: ew books
Car: too young for cars xD
